spec_data.Name: libreoffice-voikko
spec_data.Description:
This package contains a Finnish spell-checking and hyphenation component for
LibreOffice. The actual spell-checking and hyphenation functionality is
provided by the Voikko library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 27 Feb 2017 02:12:06 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Finnish spellchecker and hyphenator extension for LibreOffice
